docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The start of every year invites new resolve about how we will improve ourselves. The start of every fourth year invites new resolve about how we will improve the nation. Soon many of us will go on diets, and many of us will begin listening in earnest to what the Presidential candidates have to say.

byline.original: By ROBERT B. REICH; Robert B. Reich, who teaches at Harvard University's John F. Kennedy School of Government, is the author most recently of ''Tales of a New America'' and a co-author and editor of ''The Power of Public Ideas.''

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: New laws that took effect in some states on New Year's Day change the rules regarding drunken driving, obtaining marriage licenses, doing the laundry and taking time off to be with a new baby.

headline.main: New State Laws Will Affect Life on a Broad Scale

docs.snippet: LEAD: New laws that took effect in some states on New Year's Day change the rules regarding drunken driving, obtaining marriage licenses, doing the laundry and taking time off to be with a new baby.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ANN HOROWITZ, 27 years old, traveled across the nation and abroad for several years after college, trying her hand at being a chef but finally deciding she would never be as good as she wanted to be. Instead she turned to graduate school at New York University and discovered that she greatly enjoyed the field of public policy.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: As efforts to curb wine consumption gain momentum, American vintners are widely divided about how to combat the movement.

headline.main: Wine Makers Divided on How to Fight Curbs
